definitions.title: n.m
definitions.body: Ob:Ob 7 [[תַּחְתֶּיְ]] ´[[יׇשִׂימוּמ]], very dub., perh. net (as something extended): LXX (e)/nedra), SyrVer Vulgate ambush (? [[מָחוֹד]] or [[מְחוֹדָה]] net, Vollers:ZAW 1884, 16; [[מָחוֹר]] siege Prince:JBL xvi.l897, 177), Aq Theod fetter, bond, Targum ([[תקלא]]) stumbling-block; Gr [[מַכְמׂר]], [[מִכְמָר]]; We Now leave untranslated ; Dl:Prol. 67, HWB 396 comp. As. mazûru, appar. a pole with an iron hook, but improb.—1. [[מָזוֹר]] v. sub II. [[זוּר]], p. 267.
